name: Time Out (SpaceTimer)
description:
Avoid bullets using your shield and throw it towards enemies to destroy them!

Time Moves When you move with the shield!

Inspired by the hit games Ape Out, SuperHot & Hong Kong massacre.

---------------------------------

Full game coming out soon (All the graphics included in this prototype game are recycled assets from old projects.)

What to expect in the full game.

-Actual graphics with a unique art style

-Sound FX and adaptive music

-1 to 2 hours of content with great pacing.

Buy the developers a coffee by donating 3$ :)
